thread.section_title: VapoShop Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van VapoShop | www.vaposhop.com | 8 van 106
thread.title: Till

author: Till
title: Till
text: Fast Delivery to Germany with DHL. Ordered a Pax 3. They even included a free sample of peppermint herb, iso cleaning wipes and a neat Vaposhop sticker. At first I had problems with my order resulting in the accidental placement of 2 orders. The Vaposhop team handled my issue fast and in a professional way. They certainly care for their customers and I would definitely recommend this shop to everyone looking into buying a vaporizer.
